content.rendered:
Join the Carpenter’s Shelter Community!

Carpenter’s Shelter [Hoffman Center and Alexandria Community Shelter] offers shelter and comprehensive services for families and individuals experiencing homelessness throughout Alexandria, with the ultimate goal of transitioning those we serve to permanent, sustainable housing. The programs and services Carpenter’s Shelter offers are only possible thanks to the generous support of our community — people like you.

Sign up today to learn more about Carpenter’s Shelter and how you can support and uplift your neighbors!

By clicking Submit, you agree to send your information to Carpenter’s Shelter, who agrees to use it according to their privacy policy.
